Params: {3: 'Tifa concentrated every ounce of the viral power inside her to shoot at her surroundings blindly.'}
{3: 'A dark spike pierced through the ground where Lucia stood.'}
{3: 'Lucia dodged the attack at the very last second.'}
{3: 'At the very last moment, Lucia was clutched by someone and the two rolled into a nearby cover.'}
{3: 'A dark spike pierced out of the ground where Lucia was just standing—'}
{3: 'While Liv is in the back without any cover—'}
{3: "Lee took the blow for Liv. A dark spiked tentacle pierced through Lee's body."}
{3: 'Vital fluids dripped out of the wound—'}
{3: "Ignoring the pain with all his might, Lee clamped down on the tentacle with one hand, and pointed his gun toward Tifa's face with the other—"}
{3: '—and shot a bullet into her point-blank.'}
{3: 'As the powers of Tifa faded, Lee was overtaken by fatigue and knelt on the floor.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted around rushed forth in waves, but not at the Gray Ravens.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted rushed toward the dying Tifa, surrounding her completely. They tore at and tried to steal pieces of her body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv... We don't need to see the rest of this...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lee! Let me patch you up first—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, we'll carry Lee and leave this place first! It's about to collapse here!", 4: '1'}
